description:
Sia Partners is on the lookout for an exceptional Manager in Data Science. This pivotal role involves working with cutting-edge data science technologies and driving transformation within the organization and among our clients. The successful candidate will spearhead our data science initiatives, leading a team of talented data science consultants, to deliver innovative solutions that meet our clients' diverse needs.

Key Responsibilities:
• Lead and mentor a team of data science consultants, fostering an environment of growth and development within the Data Science Business Unit.
• Collaborate closely with client leadership teams, engineers, program managers, and data analysts to understand and address data needs comprehensively.
• Drive the acquisition, processing, and exploration of relevant data sources, leveraging both structured and unstructured data to uncover trends and patterns.
• Employ expert data analytics and data science skills to extract insights, build predictive models, and develop machine-learning algorithms.
• Design and implement change management strategies to support the successful adoption of data science solutions across various organizational contexts.
• Utilize advanced project management methodologies to oversee projects from inception to completion, ensuring alignment with client objectives and timelines.
• Develop and deliver high-impact communications through presentations, dashboards, datasets, and other mediums to convey complex data insights effectively.
• Engage in Business Development activities, contributing to the growth of the Data Science Business Unit and achieving sales targets.
